Info:

Source: Windows Vista with Service Pack 2 (x86) - DVD (English)
en_windows_vista_with_sp2_x86_dvd_342266.iso
(SHA1: 25AD9A776503E6A583BEC07879DBCC5DFD20CD6E)

Type: System, x86 - 32bit
Language: English
Volume: 1xDVD9, bootable ISO, bootable USB
Create Date: 2014.11.13
Release Date: 2014.11.15
By: NiKKA

Contents:

- Integrated updates released after SP2 to 2014.11
- Integrated Internet Explorer 9
- Integrated DirectX
- Integrated .NET 4.5.1 (contains .NET 4.0 i 4.5)
- Versions 32bit to install; choice from 5:
  (STARTER, HOMEBASIC, HOMEPREMIUM, BUSINESS, ULTIMATE)
- You can install with your original key


Instruction:

File size ISO: 5,15 GB (bytes: 5 532 600 320)
SHA1 ISO: 313e6ac1e36340a5c38bcf0676c1d48cd9b643a7

Burn ISO on DVD (DVD9/DL) or mount in daemon or VMware or prepare bootable USB (8GB minimum):
Use: Rufus or other progz, or make manualy bootble USB:

How prepare bootable USB to install Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1:

WARNING! You do this at your own risk! Further steps delete the contents of the USB drive!
Make a copy of the earlier if you need to!

console => cmd [enter]
diskpart [enter...]

list disk
select disk [select your disk USB - carefully!]
clean
create partition primary
select partition 1
active
format fs=ntfs quick 
assign

exit
exit

copy whole DVD/.ISO on USB
install system


Activate - read info in activate.txt
